about_the_game:
King's Subsidy is a turn-based economic strategy game with rogue-lite mechanics.

Plan. Develop. Yield. Trade. Protect.

Over 60 crafting recipes
Complex crafting tree. Plan Your strategy according to the chances game gives You. Each material has its own use. You will have to decide if something is worth crafting with Your supply chain.



Different maps
Adapt to surrounding area and take advantage of it.



Each run has randomized mines to discover and events awaiting you
Choose wisely which materials to collect and which to buy. Is it worth switching to based on current market trends?



Rebuild and manage city
Help the king restore the economy to order. If You don't pay the tribute every few dozen You will lose.



4 different characters to play
Use the unique skills of the most influential merchants in the world and develop their potential. Each game You can pick a different set of skills to approach next run differently.



Over 40 technologies to research
Adapt Your research to market trends. You will decide what, when and where You will trade the goods. All of these will vary every run.
